nodes.body:
### PR summary [b8ebb1070f](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16715/commits/b8ebb1070f32749c18043a938dd91b0fcf684a31)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Data.Nat.Cast.NeZero`|-20|
|<details><summary>9 files</summary> `Mathlib.Data.Nat.Cast.WithTop` `Mathlib.Data.PNat.Equiv` `Mathlib.Data.PNat.Defs` `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.ZeroLEOne` `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Monoid.NatCast` `Mathlib.Algebra.CharZero.Defs` `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.SuccPred` `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Monoid.Unbundled.WithTop` `Mathlib.Algebra.Ring.Nat`</details>|-1|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ binaryRec_one`
`+ instance : FaithfulSMul G (NormalWord d) := ⟨by simp [group_smul_def, forall_const]⟩`
`- Nat.pos_of_neZero`
`- NeZero`
`- NeZero.ne`
`- NeZero.ne'`
`- Zero.{u}`
`- append_eq_cons_iff`
`- cons_eq_append_iff`
`- countP_join`
`- count_join`
`- getElem_attach`
`- getLast?_isSome`
`- instance (priority := 200) Zero.ofOfNat0 {α} [OfNat α (nat_lit 0)] : Zero α`
`- instance (priority := 300) Zero.toOfNat0 {α} [Zero α] : OfNat α (nat_lit 0)`
`- instance : FaithfulSMul G (NormalWord d) := ⟨by simp [group_smul_def]⟩`
`- map_bind`
`- map_pbind`
`- map_tail`
`- mem_of_mem_getLast?`
`- mem_of_mem_head?`
`- neZero_iff`
`- neZero_zero_iff_false`
`- pmap_eq_none_iff`
`- pmap_eq_some_iff`
`- pmap_none`
`- pmap_some`
`- succ`
`- toExpr`
`- xor_assoc`
`- xor_comm`
`- xor_self`
`- xor_zero`
`- zero_xor`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/5383aa3c-17af-4be7-b562-bf7b29b887b2) for commit b8ebb1070f32749c18043a938dd91b0fcf684a31.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/43dcaec4-a0cd-4e46-a6e0-9d5eaf13cd50/to/5383aa3c-17af-4be7-b562-bf7b29b887b2) against commit 9405e9af9c4db56c19da07c118e4153fee571727:
```diff
  Benchmark                         Metric         Change
  =======================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Order.UpperLower.Basic   instructions   -11.9%
```
That's unfortunate, I was hoping to see more.

pullRequest.title: feat: what happens if we remove @[simp] from `forall_const`?

There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/43dcaec4-a0cd-4e46-a6e0-9d5eaf13cd50/to/5383aa3c-17af-4be7-b562-bf7b29b887b2) against commit 9405e9af9c4db56c19da07c118e4153fee571727:
